item.description:
Hi,
On this rainy day, Let's get together at Gouveia Vineyards -- There is music from 4-7pm.
You can bring food to share for our indoor picnic. Also, no hot burners, crock pots, etc. are allowed. Please remember that NO OTHER BEVERAGES--ALCOHOLIC or NONALCOHOLIC--INCLUDING WATER & SODA-- are allowed on the premises. Water and soda is available for $2.00 can or bottle. Coffee and tea is also available for $2.00. Also they sell wine samples and glasses/bottles of wine.
Hope to see you there. Please reply with what you are bringing to share.
www.gouveiavineyards.com
Nancy

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: picnic at Gouveia Vineyard - inside
